update vc_member_resource
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
already_money = #{alreadyMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
surplus_money = #{surplusMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_money = #{cashMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update vc_member_resource
team_active_all =teamActiveAll+ #{teamActiveAll},
push_people_all =pushPeopleAll+ #{pushPeopleAll},
where member_id = #{memberId}
